com.bignerdranch.android.multiselector

Class ModalMultiSelectorCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bignerdranch.android.multiselector.ModalMultiSelectorCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionMode.Callback

    public abstract class ModalMultiSelectorCallback
extends Object
implements ActionMode.Callback

    Abstract superclass for creating action mode callbacks that automatically toggle a MultiSelector's MultiSelector.setSelectable(boolean) value in ActionMode.Callback.onPrepareActionMode(android.support.v7.view.ActionMode, android.view.Menu) and ActionMode.Callback.onDestroyActionMode(android.support.v7.view.ActionMode).

        Returns:
        Current value of clearOnPrepare.

      • setClearOnPrepare

        public void setClearOnPrepare(boolean clearOnPrepare)

        Setter for clearOnPrepare. When this property is true, onPrepareActionMode(android.support.v7.view.ActionMode, android.view.Menu) will call MultiSelector.clearSelections().

        Parameters:
        clearOnPrepare - New value for clearOnPrepare.
